summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (down 0.5 mm), cloud levels (up 1635 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 46.0m lower than yesterday, 591.6m lower than the past week, 1634.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 1021.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and winds will be practically absent. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
